messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Oh? Here comes a nice-looking
Trainer. This is worth evaluation.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Our research has arrived at this one
conclusion: you’re a tough one!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
A huge variety of Pokémon live in the
Great Marsh.You see, countless years ago,
this whole area was under the sea.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Oh, how do you do? May I investigate
how much tougher you’ve become since our last encounter?
